title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 444.1 - Preface
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 444.1 - Preface

State Regulations
[3000]
This Part provides a detailed
description for each Balance Sheet and Income Statement account listed in the

Listing of Accounts, Part 443 of this Article. A standard unit of measure and
the data source for each standard unit of measure is provided for each cost
center where a standard unit of measure is required. In addition, a detailed
explanation is provided for the natural expense classification. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
444.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
